name: Stone Defender
immunities: poison; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine
conimmunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
languages: understands one language of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the stone defender remains motionless against an uneven earthen or stone surface, it is indistinguishable from that surface.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The stone defender has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
